title: The Ultimate Book Of Jokes: The Funniest Joke Book
description: Looking for a good laugh? This joke book has something for everyone! From funny animal jokes to hilarious school humor, you'll find jokes for every occasion. Perfect for kids, adults, families, and friends, this book is packed with hundreds of jokes that are easy to read, fun to share, and guaranteed to bring smiles. Whether you're in the mood for knock-knock jokes, clever puns, or silly one-liners, this book will keep you entertained. Great for parties, classrooms, or just for a quick pick-me-upâ€”everyone will enjoy this collection of laughs!
author: Devendra Singh
